title: Patel Under Scrutiny for Use of SWAT Teams to Protect His Girlfriend
summary: The F.B.I. director’s travel on government jets has contributed to growing questions inside the administration about whether he is using taxpayer-funded resources inappropriately.

title: At Harvard-Yale Game, Rivals Come Together Against Trump Administration Attacks
summary: Students and alumni set aside rivalries at the 141st Harvard-Yale football game on Saturday to summon support against attacks on higher education under the Trump administration.

title: Georgia Voters Stand by Marjorie Taylor Greene After She Stood Up to Trump
summary: Ms. Greene’s resignation blindsided her conservative Georgia district, which had stuck by her through ups and downs, including her split with the president.

title: For Marjorie Taylor Greene, a Rough Education in MAGA Politics
summary: The Georgia congresswoman strove to be both the ultimate Trump warrior and to be taken seriously. She wound up in political exile.

title: In Russian-Occupied Mariupol, Everything Ukrainian Must Go
summary: Russia is remaking Mariupol, which was devastated by a brutal siege in 2022. Ukrainians seeking to move back are finding it hard to recognize the city, or to reclaim their property.

title: Ukraine, U.S. Will Meet About Trump’s Peace Plan to End War With Russia
summary: Meetings in Geneva will include European officials, as the Trump administration’s pushes Kyiv to accept a 28-point peace plan to end the war with Russia.

title: Tatiana Schlossberg, John F. Kennedy’s Granddaughter, Reveals Terminal Cancer Diagnosis
summary: Tatiana Schlossberg, a daughter of Caroline Kennedy, revealed a terminal cancer diagnosis in an essay published on the anniversary of her grandfather’s assassination.

title: One Undocumented Worker Used a Stolen Identity. Two Men Paid the Price.
summary: Thousands of undocumented workers rely on fraudulent Social Security numbers. One of them belonged to Dan Kluver.

title: America’s Housing Crisis, in One Chart
summary: If we want more places for people to live, we’re going to have to get more creative.

title: Trump Has Put the Military in an Impossible Situation
summary: Who should take responsibility for the president’s undeclared war in the Caribbean?

title: Haitians Rejoice Over Their First World Cup Berth in 50 Years
summary: The national team’s success in landing a World Cup slot gave Haitians around the world a momentary reprieve from their country’s deep crises.

title: Titanic Passenger’s Pocket Watch Sells for $2.3 Million
summary: The watch belonged to Isidor Straus, a co-owner of Macy’s who was traveling first class on the Titanic with his wife when it sank in April 1912.

title: Retiring Before (or After) Your Partner? How to Navigate Money Issues
summary: Too many couples have “undiscussed assumptions” about how they’ll live and spend once they leave the work force, experts say.
